claims.object: Blocking activity at the neuromuscular junction

surface_layer.definition: Substances that block the action of acetylcholine.

deep_layer.mechanism: Bind to acetylcholine receptors and prevent acetylcholine from binding.
deep_layer.origin: Can be synthesized or derived from natural sources.

SPATIAL.location: Extracellular space, Synaptic cleft, Receptor binding site

epistemic_metadata.source: Neuromuscular Junction - an overview | ScienceDirect Topics
citations: Neuromuscular Junction - an overview | ScienceDirect Topics
